Posts.Content: Hi everyone I’m a newbie (to breast cancer and to this site). I was wondering if anyone has had any experience with delayed pathology results after surgery? I had a mastectomy and axillary lymph node clearance on 8th Jan but I am still waiting to see my surgeon for a follow up and to get my results. I’ve had the appointment cancelled three times so far as the results aren’t ready. Does a month seem like a long time to wait or have others had a similar waiting time? Thank you for reading xÂ
Posts.Title: Pathology results after surgery
